#summary stripLinks(text)
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Removes all links from the text (leaving just the link text).

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || The text to remove links from. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#stripLinks("Wheels is a framework for <a href='http://www.adobe.com'>ColdFusion</a>")#
-> Wheels is a framework for ColdFusion

}}}
